1      #include <iostream>
2      #include <cmath>
3      int main() {
4          double a = -9;
5          double b = -31;
6          double c = 56;
7          double x1, x2;
8          if ((b*b - 4*a*c) >= 0) {
9              x1 = (-1*b + sqrt(b*b - 4*a*c)) / (2 * a);
10              std::cout << "x1: " << x1 << "\n";
11              x2 = (-1*b - sqrt(b*b - 4*a*c)) / (2 * a);
12              std::cout << "x2: " << x2 << "\n";
13          }
14          else {
15              std::cout << "The discriminant is less than 0" << "\n";
16          }
17          return 0;
18      }
